review: Excellent for my smart tv. Love the apps, the amazon fire stick down loads the apps I already have on my amazon hd kindle. Great buy, price is right. I recommend for anyone with internet access.

review: Awesome, better then cable, works really good, I'm very impressed and we'll pleased!

review: Absolutely love it! so easy to hook up and so simple to use or move from one tv to another in my apartment.

review: First foray into streaming TV.  Other than having to have someone with much betterknowledge than I have to set it up.  I'm very pleased.
